page.title: 13GIRL'S SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Today is Wednesday.I set off for school at 8.35am.The bell goes at 8.55am.We line up and go into school.The teacher takes registration.We go into the hall.One class tells the rest a story.We sing a song and say a prayer.After that we go back into the class and do maths.At the moment we are doing algebra.We do that until 10.30am then we go outside for break.After that we carry on with English until 12.00 lunchtime.I go home and eat with my mum.At 1.15pm we go in to school again and go into another classroom for science.We learn about lots of things like electricity, weather and the human body.After about 30 minutes we have music until afternoon play.When break is over we get changed for games.The boys play cricket and the girls play rounders.
